column3: “This is by far my favorite. You have to try it. I sat down with a couple of friends and watched tom and jerryy= best time ever”

“Bottom Line Up Front: 
 I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a great sativa based hybrid.  This is a great late evening weekend / funtimes strain.  Onset is a quick and you will soon find yourself engaged, euphoric, and arroused.  potent high with lasting effects makes this great for small intimate get togethers or to smoke with your main squeeze.  Great for pain and depression.

Empirical Da...”

“Strong spicy, citrusy, cheese scented bud. Earthy flavor when smoked, flavor not very strong. Tiny buds in the gram I have (a little smaller than miniature marshmallows). Good for small bowls.

Smoke isn't too harsh, although it does leave a alight tickle in the back of one's throat. The high doesn't hit right away; sort of creeps up on you like Space Jill does, and it does wrap around your melon the same way. 

...”
“perfect for smoking when you want to do something afterwards. like painting 🎨”
“Man this is strong. Got this from Trulieve. 4-5 hits on an empty stomach and I was in another dimension.”

“Very strong! My tolerance was hight the first time I tried this strain and it really had an effect on me. I was feeling pretty spaced out actually, maybe don't use too much of this if you have to drive. Great medicine!!!”

“My new fave strain. Worked quickly. It helped me focus for studying. Got rid of the headache I'd get from trying to wrap my head around certain concepts as well as gave me the creative insight to understand why things happened.”
“This strain got me going but let me relax.  Catch 22 I know right?  It was nice, smoked smooth might have been Organic for which I give it an A.”
“At first, I thought... wow, this is nice. Seconds later, my brain exploded, my television started moving around the wall and everything made sense.”

“This is a tasty strain I smoked before taking a long walk at the beach. Oddly enough, I couldn't stop thinking about math equations until it wore off. This could be in part to my obsession with multiple regression and structural equation modeling at present. Finishing a dissertation, so maybe that has something to do with it. But, nonetheless, it is a really contemplative strain and one that made thinking about mathe...”
“This strain got me going but let me relax.  Catch 22 I know right?  It was nice, smoked smooth might have been Organic for which I give it an A.”

“Got ahold of this last night, told it was brought all the way from California. Tastes rather earthy on the exhale, the high quickly grows on you and its like your mind spins on two ends. Gets you really contemplative in a speedy sort of way, gives you a lot of new insights on anything ranging from a TV show to a philosophical conversation. Best smoked through a pipe for this one, the bubbler we got seemed to kill mos...”

“The spacebomb i tried was perfectly grown,dense and had thick crystals and orange hairs.it gives an uplifting high that doesnt get in the way of getting things done so its pretty nice. Kind if a creeper”
“I smoked this with my buddy and had a great head high where we couldn't stop laughing and tripping out on everything”
“Space bomb is the shit.”
“One cannot put into words how amazing this strain is”

“The spacebomb i tried was perfectly grown,dense and had thick crystals and orange hairs.it gives an uplifting high that doesnt get in the way of getting things done so its pretty nice. Kind if a creeper”
“One cannot put into words how amazing this strain is”

“Just took a couple rips about 10 minutes ago.  Yes!  If you have seen this on the shelf, grab it.  You will not regret it.  It does give paranoia but I love it and makes it fun to laugh about it. Now! stop reading this, you're making me paranoid.

#ParanoiaWillDestroyYa”
“Space bomb is the shit.”
“Not a sativa gal due to anxiety but this one is great!!!! Suuuuper heady and made me forget I was in pain! Nice dense buds covered in trichomes😌”

“Picked up some space bomb shatter at Truelieve, oh my - BLAST OFF! Very potent, caught me off guard at first. Looking forward to next session and heading back down that black hole. Wow, I am keeping this batch to myself...”

“This strain is hands down the best I've had. I have enormous bouts of anxiety and this seems to be the only strain that shuts it down. And depending on my mood I'll get a different experience whether that means needing a drifting through a couch lock or putting on music, making dinner - those things that anxiety distracts me from - fun! Can't wait for the next batch to come through my area.”
“Gives me a nice mellow high while at the same time brings up my mood and energy levels up . Great earthy smell very fresh and airy but not to skimp lmk ⛽️”
“Great low-key high. Good for focusing, and a really great one for down time. Hit very hard even for someone with a high tolerance. Doesn't give you couch lock right away, either.”
“Gives me a nice mellow high while at the same time brings up my mood and energy levels up . Great earthy smell very fresh and airy but not to skimp lmk ⛽️”

“Just took a couple rips about 10 minutes ago.  Yes!  If you have seen this on the shelf, grab it.  You will not regret it.  It does give paranoia but I love it and makes it fun to laugh about it. Now! stop reading this, you're making me paranoid.

#ParanoiaWillDestroyYa”
“love this strain relaxing and good for the pain!”

“A nice daytime strain with a strong head high, whixh leaves you feeling relaxed and Euphoric. No noticable negative side effects and very little paranoia. Really good for anxiety, depression, and PTSD but helps a bit less with BPD”
“Wow!”
“Thanks Sub for this amazing strain. My favorite also!! So yummy!”
“i smoked one bowl and had a long uplifting buzz. After that i was able to take a very nice two hour nap.”

“Acquired medically from Planet Joe at the NW Cannabis Market. Space Bomb has an incredibly complex flavor and aroma, like few others. Sweet, and earthy notes of pine, sage, a sweet floral flavor I can't quite describe specifically. The many layered flavor is definitely to be savored. The effect comes on gently, but definite. Living up to its name and parentage, your head is lifted to a floaty, ebbing and flowing peac...”
“it's very nice it gives you the best mode for party and having fun”
“Thanks Sub for this amazing strain. My favorite also!! So yummy!”

“Deff smoke this how ever you want. Smell is sweet wood rot with a kind of pungent gas. Also the smells-taste, is like a fresh stack of money. Insane looking trichs! Smoke is pleasant, deff tap it before you get a cotton mouth ass hit.  The feeling is like having a tiny black hole in the middle of your brain. Not a fast acting, tasty, chronic smoking flower. Maybe better as crumble or in treats.”
“man i hit this shit and i was SMACKED !! WHEEEEW ... hits nice in papers too ... yessir ...”
“Really liked this... A heady buzz but a certain lightness to it but totally effective... Found myself on the verge of giggles... Nice bud!”
“love it me and my brother we standing around stoned talking for hours....”

“I really liked the taste of this strain when I tried it out at a local farmers market. It had a nice sweet taste that kinda reminded me of the Amsterdam sweetness but not the same which was a nice change of pace. The high was very energetic and definitely made me want to get moving.  I would recommend it for sativa enthusiasts and people that like good tasting bud 8/10.”
“It's tastes really earthy. U feel uplifted and happy but lazy. I like this bud, it's great for chilling with your bros.”
“i smoked one bowl and had a long uplifting buzz. After that i was able to take a very nice two hour nap.”
“Wow!”

“A nice daytime strain with a strong head high, whixh leaves you feeling relaxed and Euphoric. No noticable negative side effects and very little paranoia. Really good for anxiety, depression, and PTSD but helps a bit less with BPD”
“Shit was dank. If Neil Patrick Harris was a weed. Didn't know what I didn't know. Felt like that 70's show in a 4 hour time frame. Ate the whole kitchen.”
“Pungent, smells great, breaks down nicely, smokes good, nice high that doesnt leave you sleepy or stuck in the couch.”

“Very nice! I definitely feel uplifted and happy, but v-e-r-y relaxed too, which is nice. I tend to be more Indica leaning, but I am liking Sativa hybrids, particularly this one! Definite sweet fruity smell, and LOTS of orange hairs.”
“A wonderful psycho-active experience. The effects distracted me from pain. I wouldn't recommend for newbies, as it is very potent. Earth's Healing Earthgrow has outdone itself with this winner!”

“Space Bomb was recommended by the good people at The Center for Palliative Care in Seattle, WA as having a well rounded effect. They were not lying. From the first hit, which was very smooth, the sativa hit first and gave me a very euphoric feeling. Then the colors start getting more vivid as my mind spins, thinking all these new creative thoughts. After a couple more hits I can feel the indica start working, helping...”
“most excellent. nice spacey high. space bomb shatter is great to vape”
“High quality strain. Extremely euphoric and it makes me want to go outside and do shit. The SB I've had seems to have purple in it as well! Very pretty buds.”
“Intense smell. Mellow flavor. With a great high”
“Great sit down and watch a funny movie strain.”
“The name says it just like it is. Hold it in deep and let the concentrate do it work. Felt like I went to space for a bit while I wrote this”
“super happy with this one. it's a one hit wonder no doubt. nice taste and you dont need a lot to get your day going. pricy, but worth it. ;)”
“Great high to watch trippy music videos to.”

“One of my favorite strains, equal to the electrifying sativa Durban Poison for euphoric and energizing effects, but without any of the anxiety edge that can come along with DP.  For my money, Space Bob is infinitely superior to its legendary parent, Space Queen.  Even though it's only a 60% Sativa hybrid, the effects of Space Bomb feel primarily like Sativa.”
“This strain brought me from a very down" frame of mind to a relaxed
column4: enjoy-the-day mindset in minutes. Excellent euphoric and happy effects. Raw buds are nicely marbled with orange
column5: and the aroma is like fresh hay mixed with lemon verbena. Flavor is just a touch sweet

column3: “a new favorite... 100 percent”
“By far my favorite I got hold of it twice love it's nice sweet taste & the high is amazing”
“Tasty sweet”
“really nice cerebral high. the smell is intoxicating with an earthy tone. definitely one to try”
“Frosty af, nice clear high. Definitely a new favorite.”
“What are the best awesome live wax and Keef”

“Space Bomb is kick ass 
You take a hit and you know it's gonna last
But not like in the past 
Were
You
Ummm...
I'm too high for this shit
like
Go buy some 
And light up abit
Stoner for life 
So take a hit”

“SpaceBomb did its job as a sativa; woke me up, kept me focused... but it was very seedy, unfortunately I spent more time picking out the seeds than enjoying my high. The flavor is very earthy, the flavor to me did not match its scent.

It was on sale as a 20$ 8th and now I know why. I wouldn't waste your time with this strain unless its a decent price.”
“I was NOT impressed with this strain. My Bud Tender told me it was like a middle road or equal between Sativia & Indica".

column1: I got NO relief of pain & minimal effect on anxiety or PTSD sxs. It may be so "equal" that it does nothing effectively. It was like I wasn't taking anything for my sxs at all.
I will not EVER buy this again & do NOT recommend it for any medicinal purposes.”"
